chapters.title: Chapter 40: Unexpected Laughter
chapters.info: Adeleas Namelle, p. 520 (732)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah, one of two Aes Sedai who went into voluntary retreat many years ago to Tifan's Well, a village located in the grassy plains of Arafel along with Vandene. Their goal some day is to write the complete history of the world since the Breaking, and some even before that. She is now in Salidar, and will accompany Elayne and Nynaeve to Ebou Dar. See also Namelle, Vandene.
